name: Minion Cannon - Spinner Legend Run
description:
Join minion fans for FREE and start your Minion Cannon slingshot adventure now! Are you ready to evolve your minions and show your skills in the most daring Minion game out there?
CHOOSE YOUR MINION!
It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which minion to fling next! Plus, hit health and speed upgrades to upgrade minions!

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Challenge players from across the world by achieving the ultimate score on the leader board. Game face!

DEFEAT MINIONS!
There’s some serious minions running towards you, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. "But they damage my minion !" Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach them a lesson. You can tap on them yourself, to save your minion and defeat those evil minions.

-----------------------------
Discover:
http://radicaltide.com/
Follow:

-----------------------------

Minion Cannon is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, get ready to rain destruction throughout this incredible adventure!

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse to any web page
- Advertising of Risto Prins products and also products from third parties

This game may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/radicaltide/
